title: RHOSLC Mary Didn't Know + TJ Lavin (The Challenge) & Kaitlyn Bristowe (Bachelor Nation/DWTS)
itunes:title: RHOSLC Mary Didn't Know + TJ Lavin (The Challenge) & Kaitlyn Bristowe (Bachelor Nation/DWTS)
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured the wives finishing up their Valter Met Gala luncheon, and dealing with marriage struggles. After the recap, Danny chats with longtime host of MTV's The Challenge abou...
description:
Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured the wives finishing up their Valter Met Gala luncheon, and dealing with marriage struggles. After the recap, Danny chats with longtime host of MTV's The Challenge about the history of the show and what's to come on the new season. Finally, Danny talks to Kaitlyn Bristowe from Bachelor Nation about her thoughts on the Tayshia/Clair season, producers setting up Clair, working with Tyra on Dancing with the Stars, and more! You can watch the interviews at youtube.com/DannyPellegrino1.


TJ Lavin Interview: 26:24ish

Kaitlyn Bristowe Interview: 101:24ish


Buy Everything Iconic merch at EverythingIconic.store


PS Subscribe to Danny's holiday podcast, A Very Merry Iconic Podcast, wherever you get your pods!
